list.name: Releases
list.query: SELECT title, description from annotations WHERE $timeFilter order by time asc
list.rawQuery: select extract(epoch from time) AS time, title as text, description as tags from sannotations where $__timeFilter(time)

panels.title: Opened and Merged PRs

targets.rawSql:
select
  time,
  value as "The top contribuing company"
from
  pingcap.public.spr_opened_company
where
  $__timeFilter(time)
  and series = 'pr_opened_companyallexcludebotsistop'
  and period = '[[period]]'
order by
  time

select
  time,
  value as "Not top contribuing company"
from
  pingcap.public.spr_opened_company
where
  $__timeFilter(time)
  and series = 'pr_opened_companyallexcludebotsnottop'
  and period = '[[period]]'
order by
  time

panels.title: PRs opened in PingCAP Org ([[period]])

targets.rawSql:
select
  time,
  value as "The top contribuing company"
from
  pingcap.public.spr_merged_company
where
  $__timeFilter(time)
  and series = lower('pr_merged_companyallexcludebotsistop')
  and period = '[[period]]'
order by
  time

select
  time,
  value as "Not top contribuing company"
from
  pingcap.public.spr_merged_company
where
  $__timeFilter(time)
  and series = lower('pr_merged_companyallexcludebotsnottop')
  and period = '[[period]]'

  time

list.name: full_name
list.query: select value_s from gha_vars where name = 'full_name'
